F_MISC.HELP: Not seeing Desktop Notifications? For windows you might want to check System > Notifications & actions and check if the required notifications have been enabled.
F_MISC.IS_AUTO_MARK_PARENT_AS_DONE: Mark parent task as done, when all sub tasks are done
F_MISC.isDisableRemindWhenForgotToFinishDay: Disable reminder about forgotten finish day
F_MISC.IS_HIDE_NAV: Hide navigation until main header is hovered (desktop only)
F_MISC.IS_NOTIFY_WHEN_TIME_ESTIMATE_EXCEEDED: Notify when time estimate was exceeded

WW.ADD_SOME_TASKS: Add some tasks to plan your day!
WW.NO_COMPLETED_TASKS: There are currently no completed tasks

PDS.TIME_SPENT_ESTIMATE_TITLE: Time Spent: Total time spent today. Archived tasks not included. – Time Estimated: Time estimated for tasks worked on today minus the time already spent with them on other days.
PDS.NO_TASKS: There are no tasks for this day
PDS.ROUND_TIME_SPENT_TITLE: Round time spent on all tasks. Be careful! You cannot undo this!
PDS.ROUND_TIME_WARNING: !!! Be careful this cannot be undone !!!
PDS.ROUND_UP_5M: Round UP all tasks to 5 minutes
PDS.ROUND_UP_15M: Round UP all tasks to 15 minutes
PDS.ROUND_UP_30M: Round UP all tasks to 30 minutes
